content: Historic constituency in Singapore **Nee Soon East Single Member Constituency** was a [single member constituency](/wiki/Single_Member_Constituency) in the [northern](/wiki/North_Region,_Singapore) area of Singapore. The ward consists of Yishun's Neighbourhoods 2, 3 and 4. Formed in 2001 after being carved out from [Sembawang Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Sembawang_Group_Representation_Constituency), its [Member of Parliament](/wiki/Member_of_Parliament) was [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)'s [Ho Peng Kee](/wiki/Ho_Peng_Kee). In (/wiki/2011_Singapore_general_election), it was merged into a newly formed [Nee Soon GRC](/wiki/Nee_Soon_Group_Representation_Constituency). This SMC and Nee Soon Central SMC were formerly under the Sembawang-Nee Soon Town Council, which comprises Sembawang GRC (which has six members with this SMC) and Nee Soon Central SMC from 2001 until 2011. ## Member of Parliament **Election** **Member of Parliament****Party****2001**[Ho Peng Kee](/wiki/Ho_Peng_Kee)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**2006** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 2000s [General Election 2001](/wiki/2001_Singaporean_general_election): Nee Soon East PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Ho Peng Kee](/wiki/Ho_Peng_Kee)19,56673.68[WP](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)Poh Lee Guan6,99026.32[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)12,57637.44[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)28,465[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))[General Election 2006](/wiki/2006_Singaporean_general_election): Nee Soon East PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Ho Peng Kee20,94968.72−4.96[WP](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)Poh Lee Guan9,53531.28+4.96[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)11,41437.16−0.28[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)32,569[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))-4.96 - [Nee Soon Central SMC](/wiki/Nee_Soon_Central_SMC) - [Nee Soon South SMC](/wiki/Nee_Soon_South_SMC) - [Nee Soon SMC](/wiki/Nee_Soon_SMC) - [Nee Soon GRC](/wiki/Nee_Soon_GRC) - 2001 GE's result - 2006 GE's result This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. title: Nee Soon East Single Member Constituency
